coreAtributes.name: curse mark
coreAtributes.description: A heart-shaped curse mark, imprinted on the lower stomach.

displacementText.playerSelf: You gasp for breath as you break your arcane curse mark and extract it from your [pc.materialName].
displacementText.playerNPC: [npc.Name] gasps for breath as you break [npc.her] curse mark and extract it from [npc.her] [npc.materialName].
displacementText.playerNPCRough: [npc.Name] gasps and [npc.moansVerb+] as you shatter [npc.her] curse mark and tear it from [npc.her] [npc.materialName].
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] gasps for breath as [npc.she] breaks [npc.her] arcane curse mark and extracts it from [npc.her] [npc.materialName].
displacementText.NPCPlayer: You gasp for breath as [npc.name] breaks your arcane curse mark and extracts it from your [pc.materialName].
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: You gasp and [pc.moanVerb+] as [npc.name] shatters your curse mark and tears it from your [pc.materialName].
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc2.Name] gasps for breath as [npc1.name] breaks [npc2.her] curse mark and extracts it from [npc2.her] [npc2.materialName].
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc2.Name] gasps and [npc2.moansVerb+] as [npc1.name] shatters [npc2.her] curse mark and tears it from [npc2.her] [npc2.materialName].

replacementText.playerSelf: You [pc.moanVerb+] as you etch an arcane curse mark into your [pc.materialName].
replacementText.playerNPC: [npc.Name] [npc.moansVerb+] as you etch an arcane curse mark into [npc.her] [npc.materialName].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: [npc.Name] [npc.moansVerb+] as you firmly engrave an arcane curse mark into [npc.her] [npc.materialName].
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] [npc.moansVerb+] as [npc.she] etches an arcane curse mark into [npc.her] [npc.materialName].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: You [pc.moanVerb+] as [npc.name] etches an arcane curse mark into your [pc.materialName].
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: You [pc.moanVerb+] as [npc.name] firmly engraves an arcane curse mark into your [pc.materialName].
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc2.Name] [npc2.moansVerb+] as [npc1.name] etches an arcane curse mark into [npc2.her] [npc2.materialName].
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc2.Name] [npc2.moansVerb+] as [npc1.name] firmly engraves an arcane curse mark into [npc2.her] [npc2.materialName].
